### export_to_excel { #arrow_wrangler.excel_helper.export_to_excel }

```python
excel_helper.export_to_excel(df, file_name, sheet_name)
```

Use xlwings to export and format data with timestamp.

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name       | Type         | Description                         | Default    |
|------------|--------------|-------------------------------------|------------|
| df         | pd.DataFrame | data to export                      | _required_ |
| file_name  | str          | filename and path to export         | _required_ |
| sheet_name | str          | sheet name. also becomes table name | _required_ |
